overview:
Cody is a Boise Idaho native who graduated from Boise State University (smurf turf… enough said) with a degree in Entrepreneurial Management.

Cody currently works for a large corporation but is actively starting his own business called Qdealz. Qdealz is an online marketplace where daily deal consumers can RESELL their unused daily deals from sites like Groupon, LivingSocial, and many more.

Besides being an aspiring entrepreneur, Cody enjoys being in the outdoors of Idaho fishing, boating, rafting, and waverunning.
